short_summary: Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Services
description: Delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea Program in Victoria, Sooke, Saanich and Southern Gulf Islands.
duration_in_months: It is expected to be for 12 months
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement: Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Services**

**Reference Number:** cb-6574-39987911
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-20
** Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-06T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-08-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-07-31

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Background:**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Canada, invites contractors to submit proposals for the provision of Delivery and Coordination Services for the Stream to Sea Program in British Columbia. The program aims to deliver education and outreach services to schools and local community groups in the South Coast region, focusing on salmon conservation and habitat preservation.

**Scope of Work:**
The contractor will be responsible for coordinating and delivering program activities, including:

* Coordinating and assisting with the setup of classroom incubators (aquaria)
* Delivering salmon eggs to schools
* Providing classroom sessions on salmon life cycle, fish dissections, aquatic ecosystems, and environmental sustainability
* Coordinating Stream to Sea Program activities with local community groups
* Participating in the development and implementation of a release program for salmon alevins

**Eligibility and Application:**
To be eligible for this tender, contractors must submit a proposal outlining their experience, qualifications, and approach to delivering the Stream to Sea Program. The proposal should include the following:

* Company profile and experience in delivering similar programs
* Detailed proposal outlining the approach and methodology for delivering the program
* Budget and pricing information

**Submission Guidelines:**
Contractors must submit their proposals in electronic format to the designated email address [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca). The deadline for submission is 2023-07-06T14:00:00.

**Contact Information:**
For more information on this tender, please contact Louise Martel, Procurement Officer, at (819) 962-7325 or [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca). 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB
